name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Side Window Manager - Split Screen View

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that opens the current page in a popup window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A window management tool that helps you:
- Split your current window into two views
- Optimize screen space automatically
- Enhance multitasking efficiency

No ads, no tracking, no external links - just simple window management.
